title: [1508521049] Gordon Ramsay's Pork Butt Sliders
description:
Gordon is official Chef for the Daytona 500 and is here with his Pork Slider Recipe for Sunday! Get the #DaytonaDay recipes here: http://foxsports.com/daytonaday & watch this Sun. at 1pm ET on FOX!

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
